body:
Yes, smash is one of the most largest competitive games out there by far.
So...discussion anybody?
I mostly main Little Mac right now because, im pretty damn good with him.

title: Smash Discussion

replies.body:
idk i think the new characters in the new brawl are pretty OP

Big MAc with its KO thing, Shulk with its super extendented reach?!?! And Platatuney with her Up A smash move.

Well snake is pretty good but im practicing on Zelda for a bit
